task.role: You are a Senior Security Engineer with expertise in authentication and secure coding. Implement Task 24 with production-quality code.

context.overview: Create comprehensive logging for authentication events
context.background: Review PRD and architecture in .tasks/docs/ for full context.

constraints.constraint: PR title: feat(task-24): Implement audit logging

acceptance_criteria.criterion: Verify all auth events are logged with proper detail levels
